1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Aishah said:"Mention was made in the presence of the Messenger of Allah of some people who did not like to face towards the Qiblah with their private parts. He said: 'I think that they do that. Turn my seat (in the toilet) to face the Qiblah.'" (Da'if) Another chain with similar wording

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّخْصَةِ فِي ذَلِكَ فِي الْكُنُفِ وَإِبَاحَتِهِ دُونَ الصَّحَارَى
chapter.eng-name: Permission concerning that in the toilet with walls and its permissiblity, not in deserts
